product_name: Amphipod RunLite Xtech Trail Plus Hydration Waistpack
long_description: The roomy RunLite Xtech Trail Plus has a large expandable main compartment, additional quick-access zippered outer pocket, a key fob and 3 outer gel / nutrition slots for all your running essentials.
short_description: The roomy RunLite Xtech Trail Plus has a large expandable main compartment, additional quick-access zippered outer pocket, a key fob and 3 outer gel / nutrition slots for all your running essentials.
